definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: : Da 7:4 wing of bird (Targum [[גַּף]], [[גַּפְּא]], [[גַּנְפָּא]] (? D:WB 79), Syr. gepo0; akin to BH [[אֲגַף]], As. aggapu ? acc. to Nö:M 77 (cf. Mand. [[גאדפא]], Targum [[גַּדְפָּא]]), Id:GGA, 1884, 1019, √ [[גִדף]], Ar. jad-afa, jadafa fly, row (but this loan-word Frä:227));—pl. abs. wings, [[גַּפִּין]] Da 7:4, Da 7:6; sf. [[גַּפִּיהּ]] v:Da 7:4 Kt (Qr sg. [[נַּפַּהּ]]).
